value:
$WmMPID_レナック,ch08_27_Renac_M_Normal,Face|So, you're Jehanna's new king, eh?
Guess that explains the fancy new
clothing.$k$p$WmMPID_ネイミー,ch08_29_Namy_F_Normal,Face|Working together with a mercenary
was one thing, but a king? I still have
a hard time believing it...$k$p$WmMPID_開花ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Bloom01,Face|I may be a king, but I'm still Joshua.
Just because my title suddenly
changed doesn't mean that I have.$k$pBesides, last I checked, this isn't
Jehanna, and my title means little.
Nothing between us has changed.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|As you wish, Joshua.$k$pBut if I may be so bold, you may
claim that you haven't changed after
becoming king...$k$pBut it seems to me that you're
carrying yourself more regally than
the Joshua I know.$k$p$WmMPID_開花ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Bloom01,Face|The mercenary one, huh? Well, I've
made my decision. It's up to him to
make his.$k$pLet's just say that I've done some
soul-searching. There's no reason he
can't do the same.$k$pThough...not being burdened by a
crown does let him spend more time
swinging his sword...$k$p$WmMPID_レナック,ch08_27_Renac_M_Normal,Face|And here I hoped that being
summoned to Askr meant avoiding a
certain overeager princess...$k$pBut of course she's already here. She
just can't resist sticking her nose
where it doesn't belong.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Princess L'Arachel always said that
you would find your way to her, even
all the way in Askr!$k$p$WmMPID_レナック,ch08_27_Renac_M_Normal,Face|Ugh. So who's going to take the
blame for getting me into this mess?
Is it you, $Nu?$k$pDid it never occur to you that I might
be avoiding her and the old man on
purpose?$k$p$WmMPID_ネイミー,ch08_29_Namy_F_Normal,Face|I was...a little overwhelmed at first,
but I'm glad that Colm was able to
come along with me.$k$p$WmMPID_コーマ,ch08_28_Coma_M_Normal,Face|Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_ネイミー,ch08_29_Namy_F_Normal,Face|Is something wrong, Colm?$k$p$WmMPID_コーマ,ch08_28_Coma_M_Normal,Face|Huh? Oh, uh... Nah.$k$pCome on, Neimi. How long are you
going to keep pouting?$k$p$WmMPID_ネイミー,ch08_29_Namy_F_Normal,Face|I-I'm not pouting! I'm just a little
anxious, that's all! *sniff*$k$p$WmMPID_コーマ,ch08_28_Coma_M_Normal,Face|Hey now, no crying. We're all here
for a reason. Take comfort in that.$k$pIf the people of Askr need some help,
I say we do what we can... For a small
fee, of course.$k$p$WmMPID_開花ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Bloom01,Face|The people. Right...$k$p
